name: Simon Says
description: Replicate sequences of colors and sounds as the stakes rise, dancing through escalating levels of intensity. In the whimsical realm of Simon, precision is your key to avoiding a dramatic "Game Over!" finale.

name: Animal Kingdom
description: Animal Kingdom is a comprehensive and user-friendly web application designed to provide a seamless and organized approach to managing pet health and appointments for pet owners and veterinarians.

name: SkyLoom
description: SkyLoom is a seamless and intuitive Flight Finder application that helps users find the cheapest flights for travel. Whether you're a budget-conscious traveler or planning your dream vacation, SkyLoom keeps you informed, saving you time and money.
